explains: adj. 燃烧的；火红的；激昂的
v. 燃烧；变亮；发光（flame 的 ing 形式）
wordGroup: olympic flame 奥林匹克圣火
flame cutting 火焰切割；气割

sentences.en: Flaming fragments were still falling from the sky.
sentences.cn: 燃烧着的碎片还在不断地从天而降。

sentences.en: The plane, which was full of fuel, scattered flaming fragments over a large area.
sentences.cn: 满载燃料的飞机燃烧的碎片散落在一大片区域里。

sentences.en: The rocky peaks were flaming in the brilliant light, the snow-fields glowed and rosy clouds were floating overhead.
sentences.cn: 在明亮的光下，岩石山峰好像在燃烧着，雪原闪耀着光芒，玫瑰色的云彩漂浮在天空上。
